content:
A VHA-sponsored report on Security and Privacy Issues in FHIR Subscription was published recently on the Security WG confluence page. If you are interested please take a look and share your feedback. If there is interest, we would like to potentially do another iteration and evolve this into a more complete report.
https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/66931686/FWK_TO10_FHIR%20Subscription-20191217.pdf
